title: Egg white hydrolysate peptides act as antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory agents for acne
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Anuwat Wanthong, Chanapat Boonmark, Nichakamol Vaisopha, Sittiruk Roytrakul, Anupong Tankrathok, Lapatrada Taemaitree, Sakda Daduang, Sophon Boonlue, Watcharee Khunkitti, Sompong Klaynongsruang, Nisachon Jangpromma
